app.name: WMCPP
app.long_description:
WMCPP is an interactive Mandelbrot set explorer. Use the Wii Remote to zoom into fractal depths with customizable palettes.
Controls: Point & A to Zoom, B to Reset, -/+ to Cycle Palettes, Down to Animate, 1/2 to Change Iterations, HOME to Exit.
Based on Mandelbrot for Wii by Krupkat.
